target: There are quite a few hotels that meet that requirement. Do you have a preference on what part of town you'd like to be in?
context: <user> I'm actually looking for an expensive restaurant that serves Indian food <system> curry garden is a nice place to dine. Do you want to book ? <user> Is that in the west area. I really would like to be in the west. <system> Here is one in the west. Will this work for you maharajah tandoori restaurant. <user> Great. I would like that. Can you book us for 8 people on Thursday at 16:45? <system> Done! Your reference number is 2AYFR5LL . Do you need help with anything else? <user> I'm also looking for a hotel. I need free parking. It can be an expensive place. <system>
